history.proof: qsimpl use: filter_ext_in_iff. qsimpl use: filter_ext_in_iff,filter_incl. qsimpl use: filter_ext_in_iff,filter_incl,in_or_app. qsimpl use: filter_ext_in_iff,filter_incl,in_or_app. srun best use: filter_app.

original: apply filter_ext_in_iff. intros x H. split. - intros [H1 H2]. split. + apply filter_incl. apply in_or_app. left. apply H1. + apply H2. - intros [H1 H2]. split. + apply filter_incl in H1. apply in_app_or in H1. destruct H1. * apply filter_incl in H. apply in_or_app. auto. * apply filter_incl in H. apply in_or_app. right. apply H. + apply H2.
